name: Rescue: Heroes in Action
storyline: Ravaged by the fierce coastal storm Nina, which caught the city completely off guard, disaster control is rushing to rescue citizens from the impending floods in the hopes of averting a large-scale catastrophe. The people need a hero they can look up to! Are you ready for the challenge?
summary: Dive into realistic, suspense-packed missions with your firefighting unit, where your decisions can often mean the difference between life and death. Find out what it means to be a true "Hero in Action".

videos.name: Trailer
